ygData.subject: Re: Neutral base under attack!!!!!
ygData.msgSnippet: Megatron turned to Shockwave, Thank you for your assistance in this matter. If there is anything you would like, please, let me know. Yes. The Energonians

Subject: Re: Neutral base under attack!!!!!

Content-Type: text/plain; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit
X-Mailer: AOL 5.0 for Windows sub 130
From: JP3884@...

    Megatron turned to Shockwave, "Thank you for your assistance in this 
matter. If there is anything you would like, please, let me know. Yes."

    The Energonians suddenly saw the massive firepower explode from the 
trees. A quick attempt to seperate only resulted in a gigantic arial 
explosion sending the four crashing to the forrest floor.
    Putnam got up, as did the others, and cursed in the darkness of the bleak 
woods around them. Slowly, the missle debris fell like ash on them.
    "They escaped. Ominous isnt going to like this one bit." Putnam said, 
scanning the area for Killfest and his men. "We had better return to the Orb."
